title: Enhanced Security & Compliance Features
excerpt: Major security enhancements including SOC 2 Type II certification, advanced encryption, and comprehensive audit logging for enterprise customers.

content.content: We've significantly strengthened our security posture with comprehensive updates across our entire platform. These improvements ensure enterprise-grade security and compliance for all customer data.

content.title: SOC 2 Type II Certification
content.description: Achieved SOC 2 Type II compliance with comprehensive security controls and third-party auditing.

content.title: Advanced Encryption
content.description: Implemented AES-256 encryption for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for data in transit.
content.impact: Bank-level security for all customer data

content.title: Comprehensive Audit Logging
content.description: Detailed audit trails for all user actions and system events with tamper-proof logging.
content.impact: Full compliance with enterprise audit requirements

items: GDPR compliance improvements with enhanced data subject rights
HIPAA compliance features for healthcare customers
